alert.note: Alert for Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Erie and southwestern Niagara Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grand Island, or near Tonawanda, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, West Seneca, North Tonawanda, Clarence, Lackawanna, Kenmore, Depew, Amherst, Tonawanda, Lancaster, East Aurora, Williamsville, Grand Island, Elma, Marilla, Small Boat Harbor, Erie Basin Marina, Alden and Wales Center. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 55 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
